resources.string: Your Profile Details are listed below:
This notification confirms that the order is placed
You do not have any favorite restaurants
You haven\'t placed any orders yet
A.1 For placing the order the time taken by the server is depend upon user internet connection. If user internet is fast then it will take time for placing order is 1 or 2 second.

A.2 YES , user can change the location after placing the order with addition of extra charge in delivery.This functionality is enable as soon as the maps are added in the application. Work in progress.
A.4 User will not be able to placed order from two different restaurant at once. This will only happen when user order from different restaurant one after another.

A.3 User will no need to pay any charges for using the beacause this app is open source source and free for everyone.However user will pay the charges for delivery as delivery charge which will help our delivery partner to work more effectively and efficiently.
A.5 You can choose your preferred batch date while signing up for the training program.
A.6 You will be able to download the certificate once you complete your training and take the final test.
